name: Maududi
text: The believers have indeed attained true success:

name: Maududi
text: those who, in their Prayers, humble themselves;

name: Maududi
text: who avoid whatever is vain and frivolous;

name: Maududi
text: who observe Zakah;

name: Maududi
text: who strictly guard their private parts

name: Maududi
text: save from their wives, or those whom their right hands possess; for with regard to them they are free from blame "

name: Maududi
text: As for those who seek beyond that, they are transgressors"

name: Maududi
text: who are true to their trusts and their covenants,

name: Maududi
text: and who guard their Prayers.

name: Maududi
text: Such are the inheritors

name: Maududi
text: that shall inherit Paradise; and in it they shall abide for ever.

name: Maududi
text: We created man out of the extract of clay,

name: Maududi
text: then We made him into a drop of life-germ, then We placed it in a safe depository,

name: Maududi
text: then We made this drop into a clot, then We made the clot into a lump, then We made the lump into bones, then We clothed the bones with flesh, and then We caused it to grow into another creation. Thus Most Blessed is Allah, the Best of all those that create.

name: Maududi
text: Thereafter you are destined to die,

name: Maududi
text: and then on the Day of Resurrection you shall certainly be raised up.

name: Maududi
text: We have indeed fashioned above you seven paths. Never were We unaware of the task of creation.

name: Maududi
text: We sent down water from the sky in right measure, and caused it to stay in the earth, and We have the power to cause it to vanish (in the manner We please).

name: Maududi
text: Then through water We caused gardens of date-palms and vines to grow for you wherein you have an abundance of delicious fruits and from them you derive your livelihood.

name: Maududi
text: And We also produced the tree which springs forth from Mount Sinai, containing oil and sauce for those that eat.

name: Maududi
text: And indeed there is also a lesson for you in cattle. We provide you with drink out of what they have in their bellies; and you have many other benefits in them: you eat of them,

name: Maududi
text: and are carried on them and also on ships.

name: Maududi
text: We sent Noah to his people, and he said: "My people! Serve Allah; you have no deity other than He. Do you have no fear?"

name: Maududi
text: But the notables among his people had refused to believe, and said: "This is none other than a mortal like yourselves who desires to attain superiority over you. Had Allah wanted (to send any Messengers) He would have sent down angels. We have heard nothing like this in the time of our forebears of old (that humans were sent as Messengers).

name: Maududi
text: He is a person who has been seized with a little madness; so wait for a while (perhaps he will improve)."

name: Maududi
text: Noah said: "My Lord! Come to my help at their accusation that I am lying."

name: Maududi
text: Thereupon We revealed to him, saying: "Build the Ark under Our eyes and according to Our revelation. And when Our command comes to pass and the oven boils over, take on board a pair each from every species, and also take your household except those of them against whom sentence has already been passed and do not plead to Me on behalf of the wrong-doers. They are doomed to be drowned.

name: Maududi
text: And then when you and those accompanying you are firmly seated in the Ark, say: "Thanks be to Allah Who has delivered us from the wrong-doing people."

name: Maududi
text: And say: "My Lord! Make my landing a blessed landing, for You are the Best of those Who can cause people to land in safety."

name: Maududi
text: There are great Signs in this story; and surely We do put people to test.

name: Maududi
text: Then, after them, We brought forth another generation;

name: Maududi
text: and We sent among them a Messenger from among themselves, saying: "Serve Allah; you have no god other than He. Do you have no fear?"

name: Maududi
text: The notables among his people who had refused to believe and who denied the meeting of the Hereafter, and those whom We had endowed with ease and comfort in this life, cried out: "This is no other than a mortal like yourselves who eats what you eat and drinks what you drink.

name: Maududi
text: If you were to obey a human being like yourselves, you will certainly be losers.

name: Maududi
text: Does he promise you that when you are dead and are reduced to dust and bones, you will be brought forth to life?

name: Maududi
text: Far-fetched, utterly far-fetched is what you are being promised.

name: Maududi
text: There is no other life than the life of the world. We shall live here and here shall we die; and we are not going to be raised again.

name: Maududi
text: This man has forged a mere lie in the name of Allah and we shall never believe what he says."

name: Maududi
text: The Messenger said: "My Lord! Come to my help at their accusing me of lying."

name: Maududi
text: He answered: "A short while, and they shall be repenting."

name: Maududi
text: Then a mighty blast quite justly overtook them, and We reduced them to a rubble. So away with the wrong-doing folk!

name: Maududi
text: Then, after them, We brought forth other generations.

name: Maududi
text: No nation can outstrip its term, nor can it put it back.

name: Maududi
text: Then We sent Our Messengers in succession. Whenever a Messenger came to his people they rejected him, calling him a liar. Thereupon, We made each people to follow the other (to its doom), reducing them to mere tales (of the past). Scourged be the people who do not believe!

name: Maududi
text: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our Signs and a clear authority

name: Maududi
text: to Pharaoh and to his chiefs, but they behaved superciliously and they were haughty.

name: Maududi
text: They said: "Shall we put faith in two mortals like ourselves when their people are slaves to us?"

name: Maududi
text: So they rejected them, calling them liars, and they too eventually became of those that were destroyed.

name: Maududi
text: And We gave Moses the Book that people might be guided by it.

name: Maududi
text: And We made Mary's son, and his mother, a Sign, and We gave them refuge on a lofty ground, a peaceful site with springs flowing in it.

name: Maududi
text: Messengers! Partake of the things that are clean, and act righteously. I know well all that you do.

name: Maududi
text: This community of yours is one community, and I am your Lord; so hold Me alone in fear.

name: Maududi
text: But people later cut up their religion into bits, each group rejoicing in what they have.

name: Maududi
text: So leave them immersed in their heedlessness till an appointed time.

name: Maududi
text: Do they fancy that Our continuing to give them wealth and children (means) that

name: Maududi
text: We are busy lavishing on them all kinds of good? Nay, they do not perceive the reality of the matter.

name: Maududi
text: Surely those who stand in awe for fear of their Lord,

name: Maududi
text: who have full faith in the Signs of their Lord;

name: Maududi
text: who associate none with their Lord in His Divinity,

name: Maududi
text: who give, whatever they give in charity, with their hearts trembling at the thought that they are destined to return to their Lord;

name: Maududi
text: it is these who hasten to do good works and vie in so doing with one another.

name: Maududi
text: We do not lay a burden on anyone beyond his capacity. We have a Book with Us that speaks the truth (about everyone); and they shall in no wise be wronged.

name: Maududi
text: Nay, their hearts are lost in ignorance of all this; and their deeds too vary from the way (mentioned above). They will persist in these deeds

name: Maududi
text: until We seize with Our chastisement those of them that are given to luxuriant ways. They will then begin to groan.

name: Maududi
text: "Put a stop to your groaning now! Surely no help shall be provided to you from Us.

name: Maududi
text: My Signs were rehearsed to you and you turned back on your heels and took to flight,

name: Maududi
text: behaving arrogantly, and making fun, and talking nonsense (about the Book in your nightly chats)."

name: Maududi
text: Did they never ponder over this Word (of God)? Or has he (to wit, the Messenger) brought something the like of which did not come to their forefathers of yore?

name: Maududi
text: Or is it that they were unaware of their Messenger and were therefore repelled by him for he was a stranger to them?

name: Maududi
text: Or do they say that there is madness in him? Nay, he has brought them the Truth and it is the Truth that most of them disdain.

name: Maududi
text: Were the Truth to follow their desires, the order of the heavens and the earth and those who dwell in them would have been ruined. Nay, the fact is that We have brought to them their own remembrance; and yet it is from their own remembrance that they are turning away.

name: Maududi
text: Are you asking them for something? What Allah has given you is the best. He is the Best of providers.

name: Maududi
text: You are calling them to a Straight Way,

name: Maududi
text: but those who do not believe in the Hereafter are ever prone to deviate from the Right Way.

name: Maududi
text: Were We to be merciful to them and remove from them their present afflictions, they would persist in their transgression, blindly wandering on.

name: Maududi
text: (They are such) that We seized them with chastisement (and yet) they did not humble themselves before their Lord, nor do they entreat

name: Maududi
text: until We opened upon them the door of a severe chastisement. Then lo, in this state they become utterly despaired of any good.

name: Maududi
text: It is He Who has endowed you with the faculties of hearing and sight and has given you hearts (to think). Scarcely do you give thanks.

name: Maududi
text: It is He Who has dispersed you all around the earth, and it is unto Him that you shall all be mustered.

name: Maududi
text: It is He Who gives life and causes death, and He holds mastery over the alternation of night and day. Do you not understand this?

name: Maududi
text: Nay, but they say the like of what their predecessors of yore had said.

name: Maududi
text: They say: "Is it that when we are dead and have been reduced to dust and bones, shall we then be raised up again?

name: Maududi
text: We were promised such things and so were our forefathers before us. All these are no more than tales of the past."

name: Maududi
text: Ask them: "Whose is the earth and those who are in it? Tell us if you know"

name: Maududi
text: They will surely say: "Allah's." Say: "Then why do you not take heed?"

name: Maududi
text: Ask them: "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, the Lord of the Great Throne?"

name: Maududi
text: They will surely say: "Allah." Say: "Will you not, then, fear (Allah)?"

name: Maududi
text: Ask them: "Say, if you indeed know, to whom belongs the dominion over all things; (Who is it) that grants asylum, but against Whom no asylum is available?"

name: Maududi
text: They will surely say: "(The dominion over all things) belongs to Allah." Say: "Whence are you then deluded?"

name: Maududi
text: We have brought before them the Truth, and there is no doubt that they are lying.

name: Maududi
text: Never did Allah take unto Himself any son, nor is there any god other than He. (Had there been any other gods) each god would have taken his creatures away with him, and each would have rushed to overpower the other. Glory be to Allah from all that they characterize Him with!

name: Maududi
text: He knows both what is visible and what is not visible. Exalted is Allah above all that they associate with Him.

name: Maududi
text: Pray, (O Muhammad): "My Lord, if You should bring the scourge of which they had been warned in my presence,

name: Maududi
text: then do not include me, my Lord, among these wrong-doing people."

name: Maududi
text: Surely We are able to show you what We warn them against.

name: Maududi
text: (O Muhammad)! Repel evil in the best manner. We are well aware of all that they say about you.

name: Maududi
text: And pray: "My Lord! I seek Your refuge from the suggestions of the evil ones;

name: Maududi
text: I even seek Your refuge, my Lord, lest they should approach me."

name: Maududi
text: (They shall persist in their deeds) until when death comes to anyone of them he will say: "My Lord, send me back to the world

name: Maududi
text: that I have left behind. I am likely to do good." Nay, it is merely a word that he is uttering. There is a barrier behind all of them (who are dead) until the Day when they will be raised up.

name: Maududi
text: And then no sooner the Trumpet is blown than there will remain no kinship among them that Day, nor will they ask one another.

name: Maududi
text: It will be an Hour when those whose scales are heavy, they alone will attain success;

name: Maududi
text: and those whose scales are light, those will be the ones who will have courted loss. They will abide in Hell.

name: Maududi
text: The Fire shall scorch their faces, exposing their jaws.

name: Maududi
text: "Are you not those to whom My revelations were recited, and you dubbed them as lies?"

name: Maududi
text: They will say: "Our Lord! Our misfortune prevailed over us. We were indeed an erring people.

name: Maududi
text: Our Lord! Take us out of this. Then if we revert (to evil-doing) we shall indeed be wrongdoers."

name: Maududi
text: Allah will say: "Away from Me; stay where you are and do not address Me.

name: Maududi
text: You are those that when a party of My servants said: 'Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us, and have mercy on us, for You are the Best of those that are merciful,'

name: Maududi
text: you made a laughingstock of them and your hostility to them caused you to forget Me, and you simply kept laughing.

name: Maududi
text: Lo! I have rewarded them this Day for their steadfastness, so that they, and they alone, are triumphant."

name: Maududi
text: Then Allah will ask them: "For how many years did you stay on earth?"

name: Maududi
text: They will say: "We stayed for a day or part of a day. Ask of those who keep count of this."

name: Maududi
text: He will say: "You stayed only for a while, if you only knew that.

name: Maududi
text: Did you imagine that We created you without any purpose, and that you will not be brought back to Us?"

name: Maududi
text: So, exalted be Allah, the True King! There is no god but He, the Lord of the Great Throne.

name: Maududi
text: He who invokes any other god along with Allah " one for whom he has no evidence" his reckoning is with his Lord alone. Indeed, these unbelievers shall not prosper.

name: Maududi
text: And say, (O Muhammad): "My Lord, forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the Best of those that are merciful."
